greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: a(n) = least k such that the remainder when 12^k is divided by k is n.
link: Robert G. Wilson v, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..10000 with -1 for large entries where a(n) has not yet been found
mathematica: t = Table[0, {10000} ]; k = 1; While[ k < 3000000000, a = PowerMod[12, k, k]; If[a < 10001 && t[[a]] == 0, t[[a]] = k; Print[{a, k}]]; k++ ]; t - _Robert G. Wilson v_, Aug 04 2009
results.author: _Alexander Adamchuk_, Jan 30 2007
ext: More terms from _Robert G. Wilson v_, Feb 06 2007
